tagline.title: BALI RAFTING AND SWING TOUR PACKAGES IS COMBO ACTIVITIES FOR ENJOY RAFTING AT AYUNG RIVER AND DO JUNGLE SWING AT BALI SWING
tagline.text: BALI RAFTING AND SWING TOUR PACKAGES IS COMBO ACTIVITIES FOR ENJOY RAFTING AT AYUNG RIVER AND DO JUNGLE SWING AT BALI SWING
tagline.html: BALI RAFTING AND SWING TOUR PACKAGES IS COMBO ACTIVITIES FOR ENJOY RAFTING AT AYUNG RIVER AND DO JUNGLE SWING AT BALI SWING

description.text: Bali Rafting and Swing Tour is a Bali Double Activities Tour Package to enjoy adventurers rafting on the ayung river and continue to enjoy swinging games on the Bali swing and take photos on several spots on the swing. It is a very good combination where you can play water on the ayung river and continue to enjoy swing and take photos at the bird nest on Bali Swing. Our first adventurer will go to a to do a rafting adventure on the ayung river, take a shuttle car to the location, and from here you will walk to the river, arrive at the river you will be guided to ride an inflatable boat and the adventure begins by walking down the ayung river with natural views around the river which is still very natural, after rafting you will return to the finish point and take a short break to have lunch with Indonesian food, after lunch the adventure continues by heading to Bali Swing to do a jungle swing with views of the ayung river and bongkasa forest, in addition to swing You can take photos at various photo spots on the Bali Swing that match these packages, after the jungle swing and take photos in Bali swing, you will be escort to the hotel using a comfortable car and an experienced driver that will make this Bali Rafting and Swing Tour adventure very fun and enjoyable.

title.title: Bali Ayung River Rafting Tour | Bali Rafting and Swing Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Ayung River Rafting Tour | Bali Rafting and Swing Tour Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Ayung River Rafting Tour is one of white water rafting adventure tour packages we have to enjoy the great challenge of rapids adventure at Ayung River in northern of Ubud village. This river offer amazing experience for your journey to explore the river with amazing panorama view. This river is very suitable for beginner who never try the rafting before but want to try the challenge. During the rafting you will stop at the small waterfall at the river and allowed you to swim at the river. Is an rare experience you will have and the professional rafting guide will always give his maksimun services to make you more enjoyable. A very impressive rafting experience by conquering the water currents in the Ayung River and seeing the natural scenery around the river while pedaling a paddle, it's an adventurous sensation that will make your adrenaline rush

title.title: Bali Swing Tour | Bali Rafting and Swing Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Swing Tour | Bali Rafting and Swing Tour Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Swing Tour is an adventure activity that we created for those of you who want to enjoy swings on the island of Bali with very beautiful scenery in the forest, really the sensation of a tour that is different from the others. Swing in Bali is an activity that has just been introduced, but because of the enthusiasm of the tourists who want to try this activity making swing activities famous among domestic and foreign tourists. The activity is located in the village of Bongkasa, close to Ubud. And this swing attraction can be combined with several tours to visit tourism objects in Bali. Enjoy swinging with views of the ayung river and the forest which are very enchanting, besides swinging you can also take various photos at the photo spots found in the Bali Swing, a very instagramable experience to do during this Bali Rafting and Bali Swing Tour, which will give memorable experience during your holiday on the island of Bali

price.title: Bali Rafting and Swing Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Rafting and Swing Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,000,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 800,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 700,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 650,000/person
  • 5 Person or more : IDR 600,000/person

Note :

  • Get Special price for group booking

Bali Rafting and Swing Tour Price Included :

  • Private Car with Clean, Comfortable and Good A/C condition
  • English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol
  • Safety and Well Maintenance Equipment's
  • 2 Hours Rafting at Ayung River
  • Jungle Swing at Bali Swing
  • Professional Ayung Rafting Guide
  • Lunch buffet Indonesian Food
  • Mineral Water
  • Insurance Coverage

content.event: Enjoy Rafting Adventure at Ayung River
Lunch finish and continue the tour
Enjoy Jungle Swing at Bali Swing

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.
